item.title: Earnings momentum is rising among these stocks set to report next week
item.description: Stocks including GE Aerospace and Charles Schwab could see a post-earnings boost next week.

item.title: MrBeast platform gets $200 million investment from Tom Lee's Bitmine
item.description: World's top Ethereum treasury company said Thursday it made a $200 million equity investment in Beast Industries.

item.title: This cybersecurity stock is down sharply since a data breach in October. Why JPMorgan says it's time to buy
item.description: The bank upgraded the cloud security stock to overweight from neutral.

item.title: Buy Dell as AI server business gains momentum, says Barclays
item.description: The bank upgraded the PC and server stock to overweight from equal weight.

item.title: DraftKings has struggled in the past year. Wells Fargo sees a turnaround in 2026
item.description: The bank upgraded DraftKings to overweight from equal weight.
